name: Chiroform Treadmill DeLuxe
descr:
DeLuxe High-Tec Treadmill from Chiroform.

Description:                   
Motor: 4.0HP(7HP/PK) AC motor .                   
Motor contorl system: Club-rated PWM with fuseless current limit & dynamic short break circuit protection.                   
Speed :0.8â€”22KM/H                   
Incline : 0-20%                   
Display type : 7 inch Blue brightness backlight LCD display.                   
Computer feedback : Calories, Heart Rate, Speed, Time, Distance with MP3 Plug in and Air Purifier ,two speakers built-in                   
Program : 5 preset programs, each having 10 difficulty levels; 1 custom program.                   
Heart rate sensors on handle                   
Deck :25mm low maintenance prewaxed phenolic coated both sides.                   
Cushioning: 6 variable-durometer elastomer cushions.                   
Belt : 3-ply urethane coated high conductivity.                   
                   
Including safety key feature.
